languages.text: "И оно ждет тебя. Ревущие, арена вновь желает напиться вашей крови! Те, кто отдаст жизнь во имя развлечения наших господ, — прощайте, я никогда не был к вам привязан. Тем, кто вернется живым и одним куском — столько стимуляторов, сколько выдержат ваши ничтожные тела". {n}Злоба переводит взгляд на вас и хищно улыбается.{/n} "А ты передай арене привет от Злобы, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}".

"And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."
languages.original_text: "И оно ждет тебя. Ревущие, арена вновь желает напиться вашей крови! Те, кто отдаст жизнь во имя развлечения наших господ, — прощайте, я никогда не был к вам привязан. Тем, кто вернется живым и одним куском — столько стимуляторов, сколько выдержат ваши ничтожные тела". {n}Злоба переводит взгляд на вас и хищно улыбается.{/n} "А ты передай арене привет от Злобы, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}".

traits.locale_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Farewell to those who will give their lives to entertain our masters, I was never fond of you. To those who will come back alive and in one piece, as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

languages.text: 「それはお前を待っている。シュリーカーたちよ、砂は再びお前たちの血を渇望しているのだ！主人をもてなすために命を捧げる者たちよ、俺はお前らのことなど、どうでもいい。お前らに心を許したことは一度もなかった。生きて無事に戻ってきた者には、その哀れな肉体が耐えられるだけの興奮剤を与えてやろう」{n}マリスはあなたに視線を移し、邪悪な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「闘技場を存分に楽むことだな」
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: 「それはお前を待っている。シュリーカーたちよ、砂は再びお前たちの血を渇望しているのだ！主人をもてなすために命を捧げる者たちよ、俺はお前らのことなど、どうでもいい。お前らに心を許したことは一度もなかった。生きて無事に戻ってきた者には、その哀れな肉体が耐えられるだけの興奮剤を与えてやろう」{n}マリスはあなたに視線を移し、邪悪な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「闘技場を存分に楽むことだな」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “它们正等着你呢。尖啸者们，黄沙再次渴求你们的鲜血了！再见了，就用你们的生命与鲜血来招待我们的主人吧。那些死了的人就死了吧，反正我也不在乎。至于那些完好无损活着回来的人，我想告诉你们，你们想要多少兴奋剂，我就给你们多少兴奋剂。去吧！”{n}恶棍将目光转向你，露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“替我向竞技场致意吧，新来的活畜。”
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: “它们正等着你呢。尖啸者们，黄沙再次渴求你们的鲜血了！再见了，就用你们的生命与鲜血来招待我们的主人吧。那些死了的人就死了吧，至于那些可以完好无损、活着回来的人，我想告诉你们，你们想要多少兴奋剂，我就给你们多少兴奋剂。去吧！”{n}恶棍将目光转向你，露出了邪恶的笑容。{/n}“替我向竞技场致意吧，新来的活畜。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Y la carne te espera. ¡Aulladores, la arena vuelve a estar sedienta de vuestra sangre! A aquellos que darán su vida para entretener a nuestros amos, les digo que nunca me ha importado. Aquellos que vuelvan vivos y de una pieza tendrán tantos estimulantes como sus patéticos cuerpos puedan tolerar». {n}Malicia dirige su mirada hacia ti y esboza una sonrisa malévola.{/n} «Saluda de mi parte a la arena, carne fresca».
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: «Y la carne te espera. ¡Aulladores, la arena vuelve a estar sedienta de vuestra sangre! Adiós a aquellos que darán su vida para entretener a nuestros amos. Nunca me habéis gustado. Aquellos que vuelvan vivos y de una pieza tendrán tantos estimulantes como sus patéticos cuerpos puedan tolerar». {n}Malicia dirige su mirada hacia ti y esboza una sonrisa malévola.{/n} «Saluda de mi parte a la arena, carne fresca».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Und Ihr werdet erwartet. Kreischer, der Sand dürstet wieder nach Eurem Blut! Jene von Euch, die ihr Leben geben werden, um unsere Meister zu unterhalten, werden wissen, dass es mir immer egal war. Und jene, die lebend und einigermaßen unversehrt zurückkehren, nehmt Euch so viele Stimulanzien, wie Eure erbärmlichen Körper ertragen können." {n}Tücke blickt zu dir und grinst böse.{/n} "Grüßt mir die Arena, Frischfleisch."
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: "Und Ihr werdet erwartet. Kreischer, der Sand dürstet wieder nach Eurem Blut! Lebt wohl, all jene, die ihr Leben geben werden, um unsere Meister zu unterhalten. Ich konnte Euch nie ausstehen. Und jene, die lebend und einigermaßen unversehrt zurückkehren, nehmt Euch so viele Stimulanzien, wie Eure erbärmlichen Körper ertragen können." {n}Tücke blickt zu dir und grinst böse.{/n} "Grüßt mir die Arena, Frischfleisch."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Et elle vous attend. Hurleurs, le sable de l'arène a soif de votre sang ! À ceux qui donneront leur vie pour divertir nos maîtres, sachez que je ne vous ai jamais appréciés. Quant à ceux qui reviendront vivants et indemnes, vous aurez droit à autant de stimulants que votre corps peut en supporter. » {n}Malice se tourne vers vous avec un rictus.{/n} « Transmettez mes amitiés à l'arène, chair fraîche. »
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: « Et elle vous attend. Hurleurs, le sable de l'arène a soif de votre sang ! Adieu à ceux qui donneront leur vie pour divertir nos maîtres. Je ne vous appréciais pas particulièrement, de toute façon. Quant à ceux qui reviendront vivants et indemnes, prenez autant de stimulants que votre corps peut en supporter. » {n}Malice se tourne vers vous avec un rictus.{/n} « Transmettez mes amitiés à l'arène, chair fraîche. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Aradığın etler seni bekliyor. Çığırtkanlar, kum bir kez daha kanınıza açlık çekiyor! Efendilerimizi eğlendirmek için canlarını verecek olanlarınız bilsin ki asla umurumda olmadılar. Tek parça hâlinde, sağ salim döneceklerse acınası bedenlerinin kaldırabildiği kadar uyarıcı alabilecekler." {n}Melanet, bakışlarını sana çevirerek haince sırıtıyor.{/n} "Arenaya sevgilerimi ilet taze et."
languages.original_text: "And it is waiting for you. Shriekers, the sand is once again thirsting for your blood! Those of you who will give their lives to entertain our masters, know that I never cared. Those who will come back alive and in one piece will have as many stimulants as your pathetic bodies can handle." {n}Malice shifts his gaze to you and grins wickedly.{/n} "Give my best regards to the arena, fresh meat."

traits.locale_text: "Aradığın etler seni bekliyor. Çığırtkanlar, kum bir kez daha kanınıza açlık çekiyor! Efendilerimizi eğlendirmek için canlarını verecek olanlarınız bilsin ki asla umurumda olmadılar. Tek parça hâlinde, sağ salim döneceklerse acınası bedenlerinin kaldırabildiği kadar uyarıcı alabilecekler." {n}Melanet, bakışlarını sana çevirerek haince sırıtıyor.{/n} "Arenaya sevgilerimi ilet taze et."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
